title: Shattered Hand
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Con and Str damage. Hand useless until healed

title: Rattled
text: Normal damage and target is confused for 1d3 rounds (Fort negates)

title: Thunder Strike
text: Double damage and target is deafened for 1d4 rounds

title: Lights Out
text: Normal damage and target is blinded for 1d3 rounds

title: Crushed Trachea
text: Normal damage and target cannot breathe or speak DC 20 Heal check ends condition

title: Split Open
text: Double damage and 1d4 bleed

title: Feeble Parry
text: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)

title: Surprise Opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty

title: Back Breaker
text: Double damage and 1d6 Dex damage

title: Terrible Bruise
text: Double damage and 2d6 nonlethal damage

title: Broken Leg
text: Normal damage and 1d4 Con and Dex damage. Target's speeds are reduced by half until healed

title: Spun Around
text: Normal damage and target is flat-footed for 1 round

title: Where Am I?
text: Normal damage and target is stunned for 1 round

title: To Your Thinky Bits
text: Double damage and 1 Int bleed (Fort negates save each round)

title: Crunch
text: Double damage and target is nauseated for 1 round (Fort negates)

title: Armor Dent
text: Double damage and 2d6 damage to metal armor (ignore hardness)

title: Breathless
text: Normal damage and target is exhausted for 1d4 rounds

title: Mace to da Face
text: Normal damage and target dazed and blinded for 1 round

title: Tiring Blow
text: Double damage plus target is fatigued

title: Concussion
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Int and Wis damage

title: Ruptured Spleen
text: Normal damage and 1d6 bleed. This bleed can only be cured with magic

title: Solid Blow
text: Triple damage

title: Crumpling Blow
text: Double damage and target is knocked prone

title: Collapsed Lung
text: Normal damage and target is staggered for 1d6 rounds

title: Flat Foot
text: Double damage and 1 Dex damage and target's speeds are reduced by 5 feet until healed

title: Skull Crush
text: Double damage and 2d6 Int drain (Fort half)

title: And Stay Down!
text: Normal damage and target is knocked prone and stunned for 1 round (Fort negates stun)

title: Bone Masher
text: Normal damage and either 1d3 Dex damage and halve speed (leg) or 1d3 Str damage (arm). Limb useless until healed

title: 2 for 1
text: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target

title: Crushed Intestines
text: Normal damage and 1d4 Con bleed (DC 15 Fort negates, save each round)

title: Numbing Blow
text: Normal damage and 1d4 Dex damage and target is disarmed (1 item, Ref negates drop)

title: Roundhouse
text: Normal damage and a free attack against adjacent foes at the same bonus

title: Staggering Blow
text: Normal damage and double nonlethal damage

title: My Teef!
text: Normal damage and 1 Con damage. Target loses bite, gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells

title: Earth Rumble
text: Normal damage and a free trip attempt versus target and all adjacent enemies

title: Pimp Slap
text: Normal damage and target dazed for 1d4 rounds

title: Cracked Rib
text: Normal damage and 1d3 Con damage and target is fatigued

title: Box the Ears
text: Normal damage and target deafened for 1d4 hours

title: Bell Ringer
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Int damage and sickened for 1d4 rounds

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round

title: Broken nose
text: Normal damage and 1 Cha damage and 1 bleed

title: Broken Ribs
text: Double damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

title: Low Blow
text: Normal damage and target is sickened for 1d6 rounds

title: Brained
text: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round

title: Shield Smack
text: Double damage and target's shield is disarmed

title: I See Stars
text: Normal damage and target takes a 20% miss chance for 1d4 rounds

title: Nighty Night
text: Normal damage and target is unconscious for 1d4 rounds (Fort negates)

title: Cracked Knee
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Dex damage. Target's base land speed reduced to 10 feet until healed

title: What's Going On?
text: Double damage and 1d4 hours of target's memory erased

title: Crushed Toe
text: Normal damage and 1d4 Dex damage. Target's land speed is halved until healed

title: Off Balance
text: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents
